Title: Production Supervisor (Giám Sát Sản Xuất)
Company: CÔNG TY TNHH AMPHENOL TECHNOLOGY VIỆT NAM
Location: Khu Công Nghiệp Tân Kim, KP Tân Phước, Tân Kim, Cần Giuộc, Long An, Việt Nam
Job Description:
• Supervise daily production activities and manage a team of production workers.
• Ensure compliance with safety regulations and quality standards.
• Monitor production processes and adjust schedules as necessary to meet deadlines.
• Collaborate with other departments to optimize production efficiency.
• Conduct regular inspections of equipment and machinery to ensure proper functioning.
• Train and mentor team members to enhance their skills and performance.
• Analyze production data and prepare reports for management review.
• Implement continuous improvement initiatives to enhance productivity.
• Address and resolve any production-related issues promptly.
• Maintain a clean and organized work environment.
Job Requirements:
• Minimum of 3 years of experience in a supervisory role within a manufacturing environment.
• Strong understanding of production processes and quality control.
• Excellent leadership and team management skills.
• Ability to analyze data and make informed decisions.
• Effective communication skills, both verbal and written.
Keyword: Sản Xuất, Hoạch Định & Quản Lý Sản Xuất, Sản xuất, Data Analysis, Effective Communication, Quality Control, Site Supervision, Team Management, CÔNG TY TNHH AMPHENOL TECHNOLOGY VIỆT NAM, Long An

Title: Supplier Quality Engineer/SQE
Company: Molex Vietnam (Ha Noi and Hung Yen)
Location: Lô P15, KCN Thăng Long, Thiên Lộc, Hà Nội, P-15, Thang Long I IP, Thien Loc Ward, Hanoi and Plots T8 and T9 in Thang Long II IP, Duong Hao Ward, Hung Yen
Job Description:
• Monitor and improve supplier quality through audits, capability assessments, and performance tracking
• Enforce in-process manufacturing quality standards by ensuring procedures and instructions are properly applied
• Train and coach team members on product specifications, machine and instrument setup, and operational performance
• Analyze quality data to identify defect trends and root causes; implement corrective and preventive actions
• Participate in quality meetings involving plant teams, suppliers, and vendors to address defects, complaints, and improvement opportunities
• Support trial runs and product transfers related to 4M changes (Man, Machine, Material, Method) and supplier quality issue resolution
• Lead or support quality improvement projects to meet departmental quality and delivery objectives
• Develop and maintain digital systems for quality KPI tracking and reporting.
Job Requirements: Mức độ phù hợp và xếp hạng của bạn so với ứng viên khác như thế nào?
Skills: Continuous Improvement, Quality Control Principles, Root Cause Analysis, Statistical Analysis, Training Development
Keyword: Sản Xuất, Đảm Bảo Chất Lượng/Kiểm Soát Chất Lượng/Quản Lý Chất Lượng, Sản xuất, Continuous Improvement, Quality Control Principles, Root Cause Analysis, Statistical Analysis, Training Development, Molex Vietnam (Ha Noi and Hung Yen), Hà Nội

Title: Sales Manager (Direct-To-Customer)
Location: 2nd Floor, Saigon Finance Center Building, No. 9, Dinh Tien Hoang Street, Da Kao Ward, District 1, 2nd floor, Saigon Finance Center Building, 9 Dinh Tien Hoang street, Da Kao ward, District 1, HCMC, Vietnam
Job Description:

6. Credit control follow-up and management.
7. Submission of Daily Report, Sales Report & Sales Plan
8. Handling of sales and marketing related assignments & projects.
9. Support company marketing strategies.
10. Monthly Sales Reporting to Management team
11. Attractive Commission & Transportation allowed.
